"Kartargot Extermination":
"We have confirmed the presence of
Darkers in Amduscia's volcanic caverns.
All available ARKS members should
immediately travel to Amduscia and
exterminate the marauding Kartargot.

Beware of Darker-infected Dragonkin.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area"
